title: Kluz Prize for PeaceTech 2025
heading: Kluz Prize for PeaceTech 2025
tagline: Using emerging technologies to advance peace and human dignity
description_html:
The application deadline for the 2025 Kluz Prize for PeaceTech has been extended to August 1st!

Apply Now

We invite organizations to submit impactful PeaceTech projects using emerging technologies to advance peace and human dignity.

We seek innovations in:

  1. Conflict Prevention and Mitigation
    – Preventing conflict and violence
    – Facilitating bridges across divides
  2. Limiting Human Suffering During Conflict
    – Protecting civilians and human rights
    – Delivering humanitarian aid and crisis response
  3. Post-Conflict Rebuilding
    – Supporting peacebuilding and recovery

Apply now to be recognized for advancing peace through technology.

Applications are due by 11:59 PM EDT on August 1st, 2025.

If you have any questions, please visit our FAQs page or contact the organizers at: info@kluzprize.org.

View FAQs
